translations: v．潜伏，悄悄行动：为了避免被发现而悄悄地行动或隐藏。
· The cat was skulking in the bushes, waiting for the bird to come closer.
猫在灌木丛中潜伏，等待鸟靠近。

sentences.sentence: There was someone skulking behind the bushes.
You, meanwhile, will be skulking in the safety of the car.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，你会安全地藏在汽车里。

sentences.sentence: There is a danger that piracy will move on from teenagers skulking in bedrooms and into the living room.
sentences.translation: 危险来了，盗版将会从年轻人卧室里鬼鬼祟祟之举，挺进客厅。
